author: taylor
msg: Added Julie MacNaught to the PMC list

author: taylor
msg: Made the PAM portlet application a webapp-type portlet application
Too many problems with local webapp portlet apps

author: taylor
msg: Jetspeed-2 now supports one or more pipelines.
Pipelines can be selected in the request by setting the "pipeline" request parameter in the request.
1. jetspeed-pipeline : the default pipeline which builds an entire portal page
2. portlet-pipeline  : builds a portlet only, with no decorators or layout
Pipelines can be added to the system by dropping them into the WEB-INF/conf/pipelines directory

author: weaver
msg: Added capability and localiztion to JetspeedPowerTools template
Adjusted templates to conform to a localized directory structure

author: weaver
